attributes.action: Make people over the age of 70 take a driving test!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well there was a programme on TV tonight about the elderly driving. It really opened my eyes as to how dangerous they actually are. It would be in public safety to make the over 70's take a compulsry driving test and if they fail, take their driving license off them! Also it would remove cars off the orad so therefore helping the environment!!
